title: Introduction: 2020 Climate Goals & Role of Climate Ambassadors
bodyText:
The Coca-Cola Company and its bottling partners are committed to realizing a 25 percent reduction of the carbon emissions embedded in the “drink in your hand” by the year 2020. That goal, which is critically important for our company, will require us to be better, more efficient, and more innovative. We will need leaders in the system to help us reach this goal.

Our Climate Ambassadors are these leaders. Climate Ambassadors are experts, innovators, change agents, and value creators, guiding your colleagues toward our climate goals. Together we will help transform the company into a leader in carbon performance, creating more value for customers, our shareholders, our communities, our employees, our suppliers, and our bottom line. Together we will grow a more efficient and productive business that protects our profits and the planet.

bulletPointFrame.title: This module provides guidance for our Climate Ambassadors on:
bulletPoints: How to better communicate our carbon reduction commitment
